#summary findAllByXXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [findAll findAll()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with a property name.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset books = model("book").findOneByReleaseYear(params.year)>
=
<cfset books = model("book").findOne(where="releaseYear=#params.year#")>
}}}
